name: Aries
description: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, symbolizing leadership and courage.

name: Taurus
description: Taurus is the second sign of the zodiac, symbolizing strength and reliability.

name: Gemini
description: Gemini is the third sign of the zodiac, symbolizing communication and versatility.

name: Cancer
description: Cancer is the fourth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing nurturing and sensitivity.

name: Leo
description: Leo is the fifth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing creativity and passion.

name: Virgo
description: Virgo is the sixth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing practicality and diligence.

name: Libra
description: Libra is the seventh sign of the zodiac, symbolizing balance and harmony.

name: Scorpio
description: Scorpio is the eighth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing intensity and transformation.

name: Sagittarius
description: Sagittarius is the ninth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing exploration and wisdom.

name: Capricorn
description: Capricorn is the tenth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing ambition and discipline.

name: Aquarius
description: Aquarius is the eleventh sign of the zodiac, symbolizing innovation and humanitarianism.

name: Pisces
description: Pisces is the twelfth sign of the zodiac, symbolizing empathy and imagination.
